topics.body:
I just made a theory for Ranma 1/2.

Apparently after reading the wikia about the cursed ponds, those ponds curse people that fall into them to transform into the first person that drowned in it. Since Ranma fell into one of those ponds, he was cursed and transformed into a girl. What bothered me was why female Ranma had red hair while male Ranma had black one. So based on how the pond works, I theorized that Ranma isn't transformed into a female version of himself but instead transformed into the specific girl that fell into the pond hundreds or thousands of years ago and probably drowned. This explains why female Ranma had a different hair colour.

In short, Ranma is *not* cursed to be a girl. He is cursed to be *the* girl that drowned in the pond many years ago.

Every time we see Ranma's female form, we see nothing but a girl who died drowning.

!http://clouddreamer.com/ranma.gif!
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
